Introduction
EFRAG has started the collection of questions related to ESRS through the EFRAG ESRS Q&A
Platform on 24 October 2023. EFRAG releases explanations following due process on a regular
basis. Explanations are non-authoritative in nature and answer technical questions on ESRS by
